vulnerability_findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.sender == nominatedOwner, "You must be nominated before you can accept ownership");
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.sender == owner, "Only the contract owner may perform this action");
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.sender == deployer, "Only the deployer can invoke this");
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.sender == nominatedOwner, "You must be nominated before you can accept ownership");
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.sender == owner, "Only the contract owner may perform this action");
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.sender == deployer, "Only the deployer can invoke this");
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in BaseMigration.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (BaseMigration.sol#3): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (BaseMigration.sol#43): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in BaseMigration.returnOwnership (BaseMigration.sol#53-68):
	-(success) = forContract.call(payload) BaseMigration.sol#57
	-(legacySuccess) = forContract.call(legacyPayload) BaseMigration.sol#64

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_owner' of Owned. (BaseMigration.sol#10) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_owner' of Owned.nominateNewOwner (BaseMigration.sol#16) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function _onlyOwner() private view {

        require(msg.sender == owner, "Only the contract owner may perform this action");
vulnerability_findings.message: Function 'Owned._onlyOwner' (BaseMigration.sol#33-35) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function _requireDeployer() private view {

        require(msg.sender == deployer, "Only the deployer can invoke this");
vulnerability_findings.message: Function 'BaseMigration._requireDeployer' (BaseMigration.sol#70-72) is not in mixedCase

errors: exception (RuntimeError: Source map error, unknown name(SHR) or instr_name(INVALID))
